search.query: | inputlookup patchphase2.csv | where phase_3="yes" | eval time=time." "." " | rex field=time max_match=0 "^(?<time>\d+\-\d+\-\d+)\s" | mvexpand time| eval time=strptime(time, "%F") | rex field=time "^(?<_time>\d+)\.\d+" | stats latest(*) as * by host | makemv delim=" " package | makemv delim=";" package_title | sort 0 - time | stats dc(host)

panel.title: Number of Hosts Patched in 30 days or not

search.query: | inputlookup patchphase2.csv | where phase_3="yes" | eval time=time." "." " | rex field=time max_match=0 "^(?<time>\d+\-\d+\-\d+)\s" | mvexpand time | eval time=strptime(time, "%F") | rex field=time "^(?<_time>\d+)\.\d+" | stats latest(*) as * by host | eval days= now() - time | eval days=round(days/86400,0) | eval patched=if(days <$field2$,"Yes","No") | stats count by patched | eventstats sum(count) AS Total | eval percent=round((count/Total)*100,2) | eval patched=count.".".patched.".".percent.""."%"

panel.title: Hosts Patched in that past 30 Days

search.query: | inputlookup patchphase2.csv | where phase_3="yes" | eval time=time." "." " | rex field=time max_match=0 "^(?<time>\d+\-\d+\-\d+)\s" | mvexpand time | eval time=strptime(time, "%F") | rex field=time "^(?<_time>\d+)\.\d+" | stats latest(*) as * by host | makemv delim=" " package | makemv delim=";" package_title | sort 0 - time | eval days= now() - time | eval days=round(days/86400,0) | eval time=strftime(time, "%F") | where days < $field2$ |fields days time host domain os tanium* reboot_yes free| rename "reboot_yes" as "Auto Reboot", tanium_uptime as "Uptime" | replace "yes" with "Yes", "no" with "No" in "Auto Reboot"

| inputlookup patchphase2.csv | where phase_3="yes" | eval time=time." "." " | rex field=time max_match=0 "^(?<time>\d+\-\d+\-\d+)\s" | mvexpand time | eval time=strptime(time, "%F") | rex field=time "^(?<_time>\d+)\.\d+" | stats latest(*) as * by host | makemv delim=" " package | makemv delim=";" package_title | sort 0 - time | eval days= now() - time | eval days=round(days/86400,0) | eval time=strftime(time, "%F") | where days > $field2$ |fields days time host domain os tanium* reboot_yes free| rename "reboot_yes" as "Auto Reboot", tanium_uptime as "Uptime" | replace "yes" with "Yes", "no" with "No" in "Auto Reboot"

| inputlookup patchphase2.csv |search host="$field1$" | makemv delim=" " package | makemv delim=";" package_title | sort -time | fields - host event os patch phase* reboot* | table time package package_title tanium_uptime free

| inputlookup patchphase2.csv | where phase_3="yes" | eval time=time." "." " | rex field=time max_match=0 "^(?<time>\d+\-\d+\-\d+)\s" | mvexpand time | eval time=strptime(time, "%F") | rex field=time "^(?<_time>\d+)\.\d+" | stats latest(*) as * by host | rex max_match=0 field=package_title "^(?<package2>.*?)\;" | mvexpand package2 | eval packdate=if(package2 LIKE "%201%-%%",package2,null()) | eval days= now() - time | eval days=round(days/86400,0) | eval time=strftime(time, "%F") | where isnotnull(packdate) | fields days time host domain os tanium* packdate free| stats values(*) as * by host | sort 0 days | table days time host domain os packdate tanium_uptime free | rename tanium_uptime as "Server Uptime", packdate as "Package Title"

| inputlookup patchphase2.csv | where phase_3="yes" | eval time=strptime(time, "%F") | rex field=time "^(?<_time>\d+)\.\d+" | stats latest(*) as * by host | rex max_match=0 field=package_title "^(?<package2>.*?)\;|\s+" | mvexpand package2 | eval packdate=if(package2 LIKE "%201%-%%",package2,null()) | eval packdate=trim(packdate) | where isnotnull(packdate) | rex field=packdate "^(?<patchmonth>\d+\-\d+)\s" | eval quality=if(packdate LIKE "%Quality Rollup for Windows%", "Yes","No") | eval patchmonth=patchmonth."-"."30" | eval patchmonth2=strptime(patchmonth, "%F") | eval days2= now() - patchmonth2 | eval days2=round(days2/86400,0) | eval qualitymonth=if((quality="Yes" AND days2 < "30"), "Yes", "No") | fields - event domain os package package2 phase* patch reboot* tanium* package_title patchmonth* days2 | eval time=strftime(time, "%F") | table host time quality* pack* free | sort 0 - time

panel.title: Monthly Quality Rollup for Windows Server Status

search.query: | inputlookup patchphase2.csv | where phase_3="yes" | eval time=strptime(time, "%F") | rex field=time "^(?<_time>\d+)\.\d+" | stats latest(*) as * by host | rex max_match=0 field=package_title "^(?<package2>.*?)\;|\s+" | mvexpand package2 | eval packdate=if(package2 LIKE "%201%-%%",package2,null()) | eval packdate=trim(packdate) | where isnotnull(packdate) | rex field=packdate "^(?<patchmonth>\d+\-\d+)\s" | eval quality=if(packdate LIKE "%Quality Rollup for Windows%", "Yes","No") | eval patchmonth=patchmonth."-"."30" | eval patchmonth2=strptime(patchmonth, "%F") | eval days2= now() - patchmonth2 | eval days2=round(days2/86400,0) | eval qualitymonth=if((quality="Yes" AND days2 < "30"), "Yes", "No") | fields - event domain os package package2 phase* patch reboot* tanium* package_title patchmonth* days2 packdate | eval time=strftime(time, "%F") | stats values(*) as * by host | eval quality2=if(quality LIKE "Yes","Yes", "No") | eval qualitymonth2=if(qualitymonth LIKE "Yes","Yes", "No") | fields - quality qualitymonth | table host time quality* free| rename quality2 as "Monthly Rollup", qualitymonth2 as "Recent Rollup" | sort 0 - date
